        public int addNewEmployee(java.lang.String firstName,
                          java.lang.String lastName,
                          java.time.LocalDate dob,
                          java.lang.String email)
                   throws java.lang.RuntimeException
        Add a new employee, generate an employee id and temporary password and send an email instructing a password change
        Parameters:
        firstName - The new employee's first name
        lastName - The new employee's last name
        dob - The new employee's date of birth
        email - The new employee's email
        Returns:
        a generated employee id if successfully added, or -1 if not
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - if any provided input values are invalid
